# Report sobre el conjunt de dades `diamonds`

## Context

`diamonds` és un datasaet del paquet ggplot2 que descriu 54000 diamants

## Anàlisi del dataset

http://napitupulu-jon.appspot.com/posts/diamonds-analysis.html
https://12ft.io/proxy?q=https%3A%2F%2Fmedium.com%2Fcodex%2Fdiamonds-what-determines-their-price-264a83c7f61a

```{r}
require('ggplot2')
require('corrplot')
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data(diamonds)
```

```{r}
num.Cols <- diamonds[,sapply(diamonds,is.numeric)]
library(corrplot)
corrplot(cor(num.Cols), method = "circle", type = "upper", addCoef.col = "black")
```
